name: Chocolate Clicker (usenowgamer)
description: This is my second game but my first game actually coded by me! I made this on my own following the "How to make a 2D clicker game" tutorial on youtube by jimmy Vegas. Its nothing that good to be honest but I have never coded before so its a massive achievement for me! At the moment its in version 1.0. If you have any questions or feedback tell me in the comments!
